title: Paradox
desc:
Post 708/706-b
- This card can only be drawn if a 706 Slime and a 708 Super Furnace are in play at the same time.
- Both cards make the other cease to exist, but they also ignore each other no matter what under all circumstances. This causes a Paradox.
- The Host gains this card and immediately plays it.
- The game ends immediately and everyone wins except anybody who had the cards 708 or 706 in their hand.
